title: This rare plant from Nilgiri Hills can supress herpes virus completely | TheHealthSite.com
author: Longjam Dineshwori
description: Ayurvedic remedy for herpes has been granted a patent by the US patent office. It uses extracts of a rare plant from the Nilgiri Hills. TheHealthSite.com
cleaned_text: Don't Miss Out on the Latest Updates. Subscribe to Our Newsletter a viral infection that causes recurring episodes of small, painful, fluid-filled blisters on the skin, mouth, lips ( [cold sores](https://www.thehealthsite.com/photo-gallery/diseases-conditions-natural-remedies-for-cold-sores-you-must-try-t1016-441631/milk--441636/)), eyes, or genitals. It is caused by the herpes simplex virus (HSV). There are two types of HSV HSV-1 and HSV-2. While the former causes oral herpes, HSV-2 causes [genital herpes,](https://www.thehealthsite.com/diseases-conditions/genital-herpes-a-cold-sore-in-your-mouth-may-be-a-symptom-of-this-sexually-transmitted-disease-761001/) which is usually sexually transmitted. As per the World Health Organization (WHO) estimates, around 67% of people have HSV-1 infection, and 11% have an HSV-2 infection. Until now, there was no cure for herpes and treatment mostly focused on managing symptoms and reducing the likelihood of them recurring. Now, Ayurveda experts have found the remedy to this contagious skin infection. Biogetica, a Mumbai-based company that offers homeopathic and natural medical remedies, on Thursday announced the results of its groundbreaking trials of a herpes medicine, which successfully marks reduced time and early treatment. And the good news is, this Ayurvedic remedy for herpes has been granted a patent by the US patent office. Biogetica's Ayurvedic remedy for herpes involves the use of a combination therapy of hyperisince and reginmune, which are extracts of a rare plant from the Nilgiri Hills. In 2004, Dr. T Vijayan from the JSS School of pharmaceuticals discovered that extracts of Hypericum Mysorense, a rare plant found in the Nilgiri Hills, could completely suppress the herpes virus in-vitro. Since then hyperisince has been licensed by AYUSH for the management of herpes. Clinical trials of these plant extracts conducted in 2017 have also shown remarkable results for [herpes treatment](https://www.thehealthsite.com/diseases-conditions/things-people-suffering-from-herpes-should-never-do-b0116-359705/). Most people believe that Ayurveda takes a longer time to show results and that someone with herpes will always have recurrences both these myths have been busted now. A herpes outbreak usually lasts 21 days without treatment. In the trial, the combination therapy of hyperisince and reginmune was able to reduce the average time down to 3 days from nine days. The trial results also showed that 76 per cent of patients with genital herpes who took the combination of hyperisince and reginmune did not have a relapse of herpes for the follow-up period of 2 years. HSV can easily pass from person to person through contact with the moist skin of the mouth and [genitals](https://www.thehealthsite.com/diseases-conditions/new-treatment-strategy-brings-hope-of-genital-herpes-cure-know-all-about-this-condition-682493/). People with genital herpes have a higher risk of passing on the virus.
